Header: More Incentives for Needy Students Organized by SFHQ-W
Content: Taking one more initiative for the betterment of needy students in far remote schools in the Wanni region, Security Force Headquarters - Wanni (SFHQ-W) on the guidelines given by Major General Kumudu Perera, Commander, Security Forces - Wanni (SF-W) took an initiative to get one more stock of school uniforms and accessories through a donor for distribution. At a brief ceremony held at Veheratenna Roshan Mahanama Vidyalaya on Thursday (29), 62 students under the sponsorship of Mr Ruwan Abeyrathne and Mr Wijaya Alwis received those school essentials due to the coordination and the request made by Colonel B.M.R.J Bandara, Civil Affairs Coordinating Officer at the SFHQ-W. The event had Brigadier J.M.U.D Jayasinghe, General Officer Commanding, 62 Division as the Chief Guest while the Chief Civil Coordinating Affairs Officer of the SFHQ-W and several Senior Officers participated in the donation programme as special invitees.
